author: luoxi
en_content: {"blocks":[{"key":"cct7f","text":"During nearly a year after graduation, I was busy with internships, sending out resumes, preparing for interviews, interviewing, and moving from one place to another. The progress of developing this website actually didn’t stop during these months, though there were fewer updates on the frontend. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":298,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hsmr","text":"Recently, I’ve been organizing the code, trying to modularize it as much as possible. Organizing the code is also to lay a solid foundation for future development. Many security measures have been added to the backend, including CloudFlare, rate limiting, public IP hidding, logging, and some more. On the frontend, the most active updates have been to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. I didn’t focus much on them before, as all these infrastructure improvements are hard for interviewers to notice during job interviews. Now that I’m no longer under the pressure of job hunting, I’m gradually shifting my focus to building a solid foundation for our website. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":672,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2cv9","text":"I have a lot of ideas in mind, including upgrading my chatbot to support multi-hop functionality so it can interact with my website content, as well as features like web search. I also want to build a dashboard that can display my server status, weather, sports scores, stock market overviews, etc. Of course, there are other things I want to do, but these two have higher priority.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":382,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uqtk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2se4e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"6trdl","text":"Medicines","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":9,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"aqc12","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"9gpvk","text":"Deliveryman with a manual bike","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":30,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":30,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"25kds","text":"During the job search process, I kept myself going with medication. My way to relieve stress was to deliver food—by manual bicycle (if I really wanted to make money, I’d get an e-bike). This helped me stay healthy and was a way to prove to myself that at least I could still earn money this way, right? Along the way, I also enjoyed a lot of beautifual scenery. I always say, “that is the least I can do.” Over the years, I’ve always emphasized my lower bound—being down-to-earth, not aiming too high, not being flashy, and gradually letting my lower limits approach my upper limits.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":583,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ic8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tm3s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"22glu","text":"Point Nepean National Park","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"2gvv7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":3}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"c11j6","text":"My favorite Point Ormond","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":24,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":24,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"aejd8","text":"In the end, I found a job as a software developer. Although it’s a small company, I’ll take it slow—after all, I’ve been to big companies before, haven’t I? Among my peers who graduated the same year, at least those I know, you can’t get into big tech without being permanent resident. The company atmosphere is great here; at least everyone has common topics. We all talk about sports, especially F1, soccer, Australian football, and so on. It’s especially funny that my manager is a die-hard Arsenal fan—whenever Arsenal wins, he comes to work the next day wearing an Arsenal scarf. If there are no meetings, he’ll even wear an Arsenal jersey to work. Still, there is work pressure but I think I can handle it for sure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":721,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7gab","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5188c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":4}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"78f87","text":"Agent 47 with hair","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"e0du","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35pmu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":5}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"7b96s","text":"Smile for peace","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"boinl","text":"I’ve always felt that my last second is always better than my next second, even though it seems like the next second is much better than the last. I’ll never forget when I was a freshman in college, mustering the courage to give a speech on stage, my legs trembling and my voice shaking. I don’t think I could be as brave now as I was then. I’ll always remember those clear eyes of mine—the ones on my website’s homepage—not the dead-fish eyes I have now. I’ve looked in the mirror countless times, and I really want to take out those of my dead-fish eyes. One day, we all mature and gradually lose our individuality as we become socialized. My dad says, “The young always try to pretend being mature, the old always try to pretend being young.” What’s the point of pretending? When you’re young, you should stay young; when you’re old, just accept it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":852,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1728h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230903.jpg","height":"450px","width":"600px"}},"1":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230902.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"2":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230901.jpg","height":"450px","width":"600px"}},"3":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230906.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"4":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230905.jpg ","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"5":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230904.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}}}}
cn_content: {"blocks":[{"key":"52sn8","text":"在毕业后的近一年时间里，我都在实习，投简历，准备面试，面试和搬家的过程中。搭建这个网站的进程其实这几个月也并没有拉下，前端的更新可能少了点。近期我对代码进行了整理，尽可能对代码进行模块化，每个代码文件尽量少于300行代码，整理代码其实也是为未来开发打好基础。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":129,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcc4k","text":"后端增加了很多安全措施，包括CloudFlare，流量限制，公有IP隐匿，日志等功能；前端较为活跃的部分是条款和条件，和隐私政策。这些基础设施因为在面试的时候难以被面试官看到，之前我就没有去过多的去做。现在我没有找工作的压力，就逐渐切换到为我们网站打好坚实的基础。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":132,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7874b","text":"脑子里面有很多想做的，包括升级我的聊天机器人，实现Multi-hops的功能，使其可以和我的网站内容互动，还有类似Web Search等功能；还想做一个仪表盘，这个仪表盘可以看到我的服务器情况，天气情况，体育赛事的比分，证券市场的概况等；当然还有其他内容，这两个优先级高一点。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":138,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6q69","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"2dm5f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"a12l3","text":"又磕了一年药了","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":7,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"dmads","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"d7msb","text":"人力外卖员","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":5,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":5,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"7bhio","text":"在找工作的过程中，一直磕药，维持生命。释放压力的方法---去送外卖，而且是骑单车送外卖（如果我真想赚钱，我就去搞辆电动车了）。这样子可以让自己身体状态变得健康一点，也是自己个人实现的一种方法，最起码我还能干这个赚钱是吧？旅途过程中也欣赏了很多风景。我一直都在说，that is the least I can do。这些年，我也是一直在强调自己的下限，不好高骛远，不花里胡哨，脚踏实地，逐渐用下限去趋近上限。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":204,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"9782n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oapm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"euoqh","text":"Point Nepean National Park","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":26,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"1kok","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":3}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"aa3kb","text":"最爱 Point Ormond","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"dhbk7","text":"最后也是找到了对口的工作。虽然是小公司，慢慢来吧，大公司又不是没去过是不是？身边同一届毕业的，至少我认识的，没有绿卡是去不到大厂的。公司的整体氛围很是不错，至少大家都有共同的话题，我们都聊体育，特别是F1，足球，澳式足球等等。特别好笑就是，我的领导是阿森纳的忠实球迷，一到阿森纳赢球，第二天就戴着阿森纳的围巾上班。如果不用开会，直接穿着阿森纳球衣上班。工作压力上还是有一点的，但是我有能力可以处理。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":199,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjjaq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9amks","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":4}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"dicvo","text":"Agent 47 with hair","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":18,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"1qc48","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":5}],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"c21oj","text":"Smile for peace","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"},{"offset":0,"length":15,"style":"BOLD"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}},{"key":"9nal9","text":"我一直都觉得，自己的上一秒永远比下一秒好。虽然看上去下一秒比上一秒好很多。我永远都还记得，在大一的时候，鼓起勇气上台演讲，紧张到腿发抖，声音发颤的样子。我并不觉得现在的自己，能做得像以前那样有勇气。我永远都记得，自己那双清澈的眼睛，就是我网站封面的那双眼睛。而不是现在那一双死鱼一样的眼睛，我无数次照着镜子，我真的想把那双死鱼眼睛扣下来。总有一天都会成熟，都会被社会化逐渐失去个性。我爸说，嫩的装老，老的装嫩。有什么好装的呢？年轻就该有年轻的样子，老了就服老就好了。","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":233,"style":"fontfamily-Georgia"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{"text-align":"center"}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230903.jpg","height":"450px","width":"600px"}},"1":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230902.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"2":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230901.jpg ","height":"450px","width":"600px"}},"3":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230906.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"4":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230905.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}},"5":{"type":"IMAGE","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"src":"http://api.xiluo.net/get_blog_img/20250528230904.jpg","height":"600px","width":"450px"}}}}

The progress of developing this website actually didn’t stop during these months, though there were fewer updates on the frontend. Recently, I’ve been organizing the...
